to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "⇧"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

rules.description: Home row mods - ctrl, opt, cmd, shift

set_notification_message.text:
🐛 📅 📝 🚩 💯 😂 🔀 ✨ 👍 ♻️ 😅 🧵 💄 🔖
B    C    D    F    H    J    M    N    P    R    S    T    U    V

to.shell_command: open raycast://extensions/raycast/emoji-symbols/search-emoji-symbols
